topic: Computer Science Courses and Credit Transfer

correspondence.message: Hello, I'm studying business informatics and would like to take more computer science courses than are included in the elective. Can I choose which of the courses I take should be credited, or are there fixed rules for this?"

As long as all the courses you have taken are part of the Bachelor of Business Information Systems, you are free to choose what you want to include. Simply let your secretary know when you prepare your certificate.
